ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Cold Plays: The arctic Joes attempt escape from their captors in the Antarctic with needed information about Cobra's new scheme using subliminal mind control from many years ago. Firefly and Crystal Ball are charged with attempting to take control of Colton's laser array in space, backed by Night Creepers flying in as support, but fail when the Creepers back out as they're targeted by Destro in a Night Raven and by Colton, Jane, and Mainframe fighting back. Dusty confronts Sneak Peek as to why he faked his death in Benzheen, but Sneak Peek refuses to divulge anything about his other mission.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:57:42. [CVDB280331] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:41:52. [Issue ID 860769]
